title: Inquire About Becoming a Foster Parent
description: A citizen is interested in becoming a foster parent and is calling for information.

tasks.description: Provide information on the basic requirements to become a foster parent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the eligibility criteria (e.g., age, background check).

tasks.description: Explain the application and training process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent outlines the steps involved, from application to certification.

tasks.description: Sign the caller up for an upcoming information session.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully registers the caller for an info session.
